This viewer was in a mood to be thilled and this movie gave me that and more. I was mood with fear and could not wait for more but I would stress if you are watching this movies alone make sure you have your lights on they are that great.
This is a very good horror movie a must have for any boogeyman lover out there. This is The best

I love the 1st boogieman movie. I think it has a lot of original ideas whihc is hard to find in the horror movies of resent. the parts 2 and 3 are good but not great or as good as the 1st one. Typically sequells are not. but as a horror movie fan i love box sets! usually cheaper than buying them individaully also.
Good boogeyman movies. Some might say they are corny but great horror and suspense in all three movies. Definitely a buyer.
love this movie had to added to my files the price was great and it arrive right on time geat deal
All three of these movies was very good. It was kind of confusing but it all became to make since.
Got this set and it played wonderfully. We did not like the second as much as the others simply because it was not along the same lines as the others. But it was still a good movie.

The first Boogeyman movie is a pretty good horror flick, touching on that base fear of something in the dark coming for us. The second expands this idea but changes it and makes it a little more interesting, the third.. well it takes all the good the second movie did and ruins it within twenty minutes.
I say stick around for the first two and avoid the third.

My biggest complaint with this collection is that the DVD's aren't housed on individual plastic slabs, rather they're all stacked on one spindle. I noticed a scratch on my second DVD that had to have happened during packaging as I had just opened it. I wish they'd come with their own sleeves, or anything other than stacking them.

Great Trilogy Boogeyman really scares you because it's every kids and even adults worst nightmare. Check under your bed, in your closet or in your basement before the boogeyman gets you. Case and discs were perfect thankyou and lets not forget the price is great.
I like the boogeyman movies
The 3rd disc was a little scratched but it plays pretty well.
Love this movie

I only wanted one boogeyman movie but  this was cheap..so.  once again I didn't do my home work. I liked boogeyman 1 in this pack but not the other 2, but neither was what I wanted. I wanted the Syfy channel boogeyman, that's the one I like. So the search goes on. But these  were so cheap that I sold them for what i paid after watching them

The Boogeyman movies were good enough but I wasn't crazy about the packaging. The three dvd set simply stacks all three dvd's on top of each other with no barriers, which not only makes it hard to get them out of the case, but also makes it easier to scratch them.
